name: Mini Copper Skyscale Hatchling
description:
A skyscale's strength is strongly tied to the amount of care it receives as a hatchling.
Combine 2 Blue and 1 Copper Skyscale Hatchling with 8 Unidentified Dyes in the Mystic Forge to create a White Skyscale Hatchling.
Combine 1 Red and 2 Copper Skyscale Hatchlings with 12 Unidentified Dyes in the Mystic Forge to create a Gold Skyscale Hatchling.
